title: League of Legends Please Fix The Patcher
body: Recently my game crashes/bugsplats at champ loading screen so i write a ticket for support. what seems to be the issue - i get game crashed due to you have disconnected from internet - you have currupt files - bugsplat . Suggested fixes 1 use an open dns 2 add exceptions to firewall 3 repair your lol client 4 reload the whole game. ok i will try all this stuff. step 1 started using open dns  result still having issues step 2 add exceptions to firewall still having issues so disable firewall and defender step 4 repair client still haveing issues step 5 reinstall lol still having issues. Support it must be your computers hard drive run check disk ok i run chkdsk  0 errors found. i have come to the conclusion that the patcher is broken AF.

replies.body:
I checked your ticket and it seems you haven't provided the tech specialists with a set of [Hextech logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) yet. I **strongly recommend** running a set and attaching them to your ticket so we have more context on what's going on with the patcher.

Let me know if you have any questions.

oh forgot to mention your anti virus software must be the problem my response i dont have anti virus software their response it must be a third party software issue ok re-image pc  with fresh window reapply  open dns turn off firewall and defender  load lol still having same issue after one game i go to play a second game and at champ select game crashes and says i have currupt files  riot pls
